name: Things Too Ugly Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 33 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 265 MB available space

short_description: Listen to the original songs that played through the in-game portable radio. Father Floodplain, It Came from the Aether, and more return in this digital soundtrack.
